attributes.action: To ensure that all funeral directors undergo a criminal records check (CRB/DBS).
attributes.additional_details: The national association of funeral directors has confirmed that there is not governing body regulating funeral directors. This is very worrying.
attributes.background: Funeral directors are unregulated and do not need any background checks before starting a business. They have access to people at their most vunerable and their homes when removing deceased. A criminal records check should be the least they can do before expecting us to put our trust in them.
